author: adammurdoch
msg: Generalised the solution to the deadlock problem when copying files within the same FTP
file system, as the problem actually applies to any operation on an FTP file system while
a file's content is being read from or written to.  Now the FTP file system will spin up

author: adammurdoch
msg: Switch on javadocs for non-public classes.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Always ignore test failures when building the Jar.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Added details of how to download and build VFS.
